title: [TCP][1.10]确定两点，立刻全自动测量这个区域的长宽高
author: LBL_CB
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LBL_CB 于 2016-6-11 21:46 编辑 





确定两点，形成一个立方体空间
跟fill等是一样的样子


我先来说说OOC效果






---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






点击告示牌，可以获得一个蛋，这个蛋就是来确定坐标的物品

这个OOC目前只可以在x，y，z的正方向才可以工作
也就是说，你确定的两点必须是
第一个点的X,Y,Z坐标都小于或等于第二个点的坐标
（这不是OOC的缺点，也可以做到任意两点。但这样子OOC的大小基本要翻6倍，所以，这太麻烦了。）
所以，你可以使用F3来更方便的确定两点









↑ 这是例子 ↓





确定好两点后，只要这两点是正确的，右边的信息栏就会有结果了！


↓








PS:长和宽其实只是两个数字而已，所以有可能会出现宽度比长度还长




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




核心原理




这两个点都有个分别有不一样的AS
确定好两点后，就靠下面这些指令惹



execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~1 tp @e[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000,dz=1000] ~ ~ ~-1
execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~ tp @e[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000] ~ ~-1 ~
execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~ tp @e[tag=AS2,dx=1000] ~-1 ~ ~复制代码


这些指令都会相应的TP一次加一分到计分板里
创建的计分板初值是1，不是0，相信你们会明白为什么的 : P







有点和这个帖子的原理是倒过来的
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-585956-1-1.html





这个是OOC
↓
↓
↓




















summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:stone,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Passengers:

[{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"fill ~2 ~-3 ~-1 ~18 ~-1 ~2 bone_block 0 hollow"},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"fill ~2 ~-2 ~-1 ~18 ~-2 ~2 minecraft:stained_glass_pane 5 replace bone_block"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add 

box dummy"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set c box 0"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set l box 1"},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set w box 1"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set h box 1"},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add box2 dummy 测量"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar box2"},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set 长度 box2 1"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set 高度 box2 1"},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard players set 宽度 box2 1"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~1 ~-2 ~ wall_sign 4 replace {Text1:"{\\"text\\":\\

"--------\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\",\\"clickEvent\\":{\\"action\\":\\"run_command\\",\\"value\\":\\"give @a minecraft:spawn_egg 1 0 {EntityTag:{id:\\\\\\

"Shulker\\\\\\",Tags:[\\\\\\"zb\\\\\\"]},ench:[],display:{Name:\\\\\\"探测点\\\\\\"}}\\"},\\"bold\\":true}",Text2:"{\\"text\\":\\"获取右键\\",\\"color\\":\\

"dark_green\\"}",Text3:"{\\"text\\":\\"探测物品\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_green\\"}",Text4:"{\\"text\\":\\"---------\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\",\\"bold\\

":true}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS2] ~ ~ ~ particle reddust ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~4 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] ~ ~ ~ particle happyVillager ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~5 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players operation 高度 box2 = h box"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players operation 宽度 box2 = w box"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~7 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players operation 长度 box2 = l box"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~8 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players set c box 0"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~9 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"kill @e[tag=AS2]"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~10 ~-2 ~1 

chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"kill @e[tag=AS]"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~11 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute 

@e[tag=AS] ~ ~ ~ /testfor @e[tag=AS2,r=0]"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~12 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~ tp 

@e[tag=AS2,dx=1000] ~-1 ~ ~"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~13 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~ execute @e

[tag=AS2,dx=1000] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players add w box 1"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~14 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard 

players test c box 3 3"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~15 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~ tp @e

[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000] ~ ~-1 ~"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~16 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] ~1 ~1 ~ execute 

@e[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players add h box 1"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~17 ~-2 ~1 repeating_command_block 4 replace 

{auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players test c box 3 3"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~17 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=AS] 

~1 ~ ~1 tp @e[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000,dz=1000] ~ ~ ~-1"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~16 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e

[tag=AS] ~1 ~ ~1 execute @e[tag=AS2,dx=1000,dy=1000,dz=1000] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players add l box 1"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~15 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 5 

replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players test c box 3 3"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~14 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"kill @e

[tag=zb]"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~13 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players set c box 3"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~12 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ summon ArmorStand ~ ~0.5 ~ 

{Marker:1,Invisible:1,NoGravity:1,Tags:[\\"AS2\\"]}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~11 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players 

test c box 1 1"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~10 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players set c box 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~9 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"kill @e[tag=zb]"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~8 ~-2 ~ 

chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ summon ArmorStand ~ ~0.5 ~ {Marker:1,Invisible:1,NoGravity:1,Tags:[\\"AS\\"]}"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~7 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set c box 0"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set h box 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~5 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set w box 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~4 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[tag=zb] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set l box 1"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~ repeating_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players test c box 0 0"}},

{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~ ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~-3 ~-1 ~ ~ ~ air}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 

redstone_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1]}]}]}]}复制代码




























[groupid=1009]The Command's Power[/groupid]

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 林扬骐 于 2016-6-13 12:06 编辑 

我就看看不说话233（乙烯曾用二分法做到坐标探测（虽说有点bug），我后来也用在造斜线机上（是的已经很久没更了））
（其实二分法真的更快）

另外ooc块修一下，怎么跑出那么多序号
